description: This table contains the hospital account alternate reason for visit diagnoses from the hospital account (HAR) master file.   Alternate reason for visit diagnoses will be specified if hospital accounts are coded with two sets of ICD codes.

columns.name: ACCT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the hospital account record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: RFV_DX_ALT_ID
columns.description: The alternate reason for visit diagnoses stored in the hospital account.
